item.title: Rota Fortunae: A Simple Fantasy RPG Framework
item.description: Rota Fortunae is a simple fantasy rpg framework driven byÂ CarPG. We took the base rules and repackaged it as a complete, stand alone 16-page PDF fantasy game. In addition to showcasing the system in a clean layout, we added all sorts of fun stuff: Expanded Skills & Tags A simple magic system with expanded options. 8 fantasy races (plus humans) Additional house-rule options to expand or simplify the game.
